name: Unify
long_description:
Unify is the central platform for optimized LLM deployment.

With a single API key and unified prompting syntax, Unify lets you call and benchmark all third-party LLM endpoint providers; find the endpoints that match your speed, latency and cost requirements; and automatically route any prompt to the best LLM using a global mixture-of-experts that's better, faster and cheaper than any individual model.

Start routing now at unify.ai ✨
one_liner: Route Your Prompt to the Best LLM ✨
